__e: Just because Citizen Z is dead, doesn't mean hope is dead.
I couldn't get Z off his butt for the last 10 years and then you come along and...
We need a few people to go check and clean up some Zs and see what's going on at the perimeter.
Z, isn't there a girl around you could ask?
